titleText: GitHub now warns of security flaws in your project
mainText: GitHub is helping to ensure your project is secure by alerting developers if a vulnerability is detected.

titleText: Microsoft upgrades and open sources Java debugger for Visual Studio Code
mainText: Microsoft has open sourced the Java debugger extension for Visual Studio Code after receiving numerous constructive feedback and suggestions from Java developers.

titleText: Android 8.1 Developer Preview released with Neural Networks API
mainText: AI is the next frontier in smartphones, and Google plans to lead the charge with a dedicated Neural Networks API in the latest Android developer preview.
